imdb.plot outline: This is a story about two sisters out of which one is living with their mamoo and the other one has been adopted by her khala. The drama will show how certain mistakes in life can change the entire scenario and cause a trickle down effect on the lives of several people involved. What are those mistakes and who committed it and what will be the consequences?
imdb.title: Ghalti
plot: This is a story about two sisters out of which one is living with their mamoo and the other one has been adopted by her khala. The drama will show how certain mistakes in life can change the entire scenario and cause a trickle down effect on the lives of several people involved. What are those mistakes and who committed it and what will be the consequences?
